original_title: Two medical assistants arrested over death of a patient at the National Institute of Mental Health in Angoda
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – An urgent inquiry is to be conducted over the death of a patient warded at the National Institute of Mental Health in Angoda, the Human Rights Commission of Sri Lanka said.
Two medical assistants were arrested on Friday over the death and have been suspended by the hospital, according to the Hospital Director.
AG appoints 15 member committee to look into substandard medicine
Two including a Russian national. dead in a motor accident in Ududumbara
